featured.text: In contrast (C) Literally (D) Accordingly 27. (A) gap (B) link (C) clue (D) ratio 28. (A) out of (B) as well as (C) in case of (D) due to 29.
They were literally out of their seats and singing and dancing in the aisles.

definition.en_def: In a literal manner; exactly as stated without exaggeration or metaphor.
definition.example: He was literally running for his life.
